87098.text: Adds "volume.beta.kubernetes.io/migrated-to" annotation to PV's and PVC's when they are migrated to signal external provisioners to pick up those objects for Provisioning and Deleting.
87098.markdown: Adds "volume.beta.kubernetes.io/migrated-to" annotation to PV's and PVC's when they are migrated to signal external provisioners to pick up those objects for Provisioning and Deleting. 88689.text: Fix handling of aws-load-balancer-security-groups annotation. Security-Groups assigned with this annotation are no longer modified by kubernetes which is the expected behaviour of most users. Also no unnecessary Security-Groups are created anymore if this annotation is used.
88689.markdown: Fix handling of aws-load-balancer-security-groups annotation. Security-Groups assigned with this annotation are no longer modified by kubernetes which is the expected behaviour of most users. Also no unnecessary Security-Groups are created anymore if this annotation is used. ([#88689](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/88689), [@Elias481](https://github.com/Elias481)) [SIG Cloud Provider]
88689.author: Elias481

88953.text: Fix /readyz to return error immediately after a shutdown is initiated, before the --shutdown-delay-duration has elapsed.
